IsAutoFit.name: IsAutoFit
IsAutoFit.description: Checks if the text field content is autofit, i.e. whether the font size adjusts to the size of the fixed size form.

SetAutoFit.name: SetAutoFit
SetAutoFit.description: Specifies if the text field content should be autofit, i.e. whether the font size adjusts to the size of the fixed size form.

params.name: bAutoFit
params.description: Defines if the text field content is autofit (true) or not (false).

IsMultiline.name: IsMultiline
IsMultiline.description: Checks if the current text field is multiline.

SetMultiline.name: SetMultiline
SetMultiline.description: Specifies if the current text field should be miltiline.

params.name: bMultiline
params.description: Defines if the current text field is multiline (true) or not (false).

GetCharactersLimit.name: GetCharactersLimit
GetCharactersLimit.description: Returns a limit of the text field characters.

SetCharactersLimit.name: SetCharactersLimit
SetCharactersLimit.description: Sets a limit to the text field characters.

params.name: nChars
params.description: The maximum number of characters in the text field. If this parameter is equal to -1, no limit will be set. A limit is required to be set if a comb of characters is applied. Maximum value for this parameter is 1000000.

IsComb.name: IsComb
IsComb.description: Checks if the text field is a comb of characters with the same cell width.

SetComb.name: SetComb
SetComb.description: Specifies if the text field should be a comb of characters with the same cell width. The maximum number of characters must be set to a positive value.

params.name: bComb
params.description: Defines if the text field is a comb of characters (true) or not (false).

SetCellWidth.name: SetCellWidth
SetCellWidth.description: Sets the cell width to the applied comb of characters.

params.name: nCellWidth
params.description: The cell width measured in millimeters. If this parameter is not specified or equal to 0 or less, then the width will be set automatically. Must be >= 1 and <= 558.8.

SetText.name: SetText
SetText.description: Sets the text to the current text field.

params.name: sText
params.description: The text that will be set to the current text field.

GetClassType.name: GetClassType
GetClassType.description: Returns a type of the ApiFormBase class.

GetFormType.name: GetFormType
GetFormType.description: Returns a type of the current form.

SetFormKey.name: SetFormKey
SetFormKey.description: Sets a key to the current form.

params.name: sKey
params.description: Form key.

GetTipText.name: GetTipText
GetTipText.description: Returns the tip text of the current form.

SetTipText.name: SetTipText
SetTipText.description: Sets the tip text to the current form.

params.name: sText
params.description: Tip text.

IsRequired.name: IsRequired
IsRequired.description: Checks if the current form is required.

SetRequired.name: SetRequired
SetRequired.description: Specifies if the current form should be required.

params.name: bRequired
params.description: Defines if the current form is required (true) or not (false).

IsFixed.name: IsFixed
IsFixed.description: Checks if the current form is fixed size.

ToFixed.name: ToFixed
ToFixed.description: Converts the current form to a fixed size form.

params.name: nWidth
params.description: The wrapper shape width measured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch).

params.name: nHeight
params.description: The wrapper shape height measured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch).

ToInline.name: ToInline
ToInline.description: Converts the current form to an inline form. Picture form can't be converted to an inline form, it's always a fixed size object.

SetBorderColor.name: SetBorderColor
SetBorderColor.description: Sets the border color to the current form.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

params.name: bNone
params.description: Defines that border color will not be set.

SetBackgroundColor.name: SetBackgroundColor
SetBackgroundColor.description: Sets the background color to the current form.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

params.name: bNone
params.description: Defines that background color will not be set.

GetText.name: GetText
GetText.description: Returns the text from the current form. This method is used only for text and combo box forms.

GetWrapperShape.name: GetWrapperShape
GetWrapperShape.description: Returns a shape in which the form is placed to control the position and size of the fixed size form frame. The null value will be returned for the inline forms.

SetPlaceholderText.name: SetPlaceholderText
SetPlaceholderText.description: Sets the placeholder text to the current form. Can't be set to checkbox or radio button.

params.name: sText
params.description: The text that will be set to the current form.

SetTextPr.name: SetTextPr
SetTextPr.description: Sets the text properties to the current form. This method is used only for text and combo box forms.

params.name: oTextPr
params.description: The text properties that will be set to the current form.

GetTextPr.name: GetTextPr
GetTextPr.description: Returns the text properties from the current form. This method is used only for text and combo box forms.

Copy.name: Copy
Copy.description: Copies the current form (copies with the shape if it exists).

comment:
/**
	 * Class representing a document text field.
	 * @constructor
	 * @typeofeditors ["CDE", "CFE"]
	 * @property {boolean} comb - Specifies if the text field should be a comb of characters with the same cell width. The maximum number of characters must be set to a positive value.
	 * @property {number} maxCharacters - The maximum number of characters in the text field.
	 * @property {number} cellWidth - The cell width for each character measured in millimeters. If this parameter is not specified or equal to 0 or less, then the width will be set automatically.
	 * @property {boolean} multiLine - Specifies if the current fixed size text field is multiline or not.
	 * @property {boolean} autoFit - Specifies if the text field content should be autofit, i.e. whether the font size adjusts to the size of the fixed size form.
	 * @extends {ApiFormBase}
	 */

properties.name: comb
properties.description: Specifies if the text field should be a comb of characters with the same cell width. The maximum number of characters must be set to a positive value.

properties.name: maxCharacters
properties.description: The maximum number of characters in the text field.

properties.name: cellWidth
properties.description: The cell width for each character measured in millimeters. If this parameter is not specified or equal to 0 or less, then the width will be set automatically.

properties.name: multiLine
properties.description: Specifies if the current fixed size text field is multiline or not.

properties.name: autoFit
properties.description: Specifies if the text field content should be autofit, i.e. whether the font size adjusts to the size of the fixed size form.
